name: Crafted_Fury_of_the_Gladiator_F
display_name: Crafted Fury of the Gladiator F
display_fullname: Boosts.Crafted Fury of the Gladiator F
display_help: UNIQUE -- No more than 1 enhancement of this type may be slotted by a character. Gives a chance to reduce your foes' damage resistance by 20%. This effect will trigger roughly 3.5 times per minute. NOTE: This is a PvP enhancement, this type of enhancement has two groups of set bonuses. You get the set bonuses not marked "(PvP)" while experiencing PvE content, but you get both the PvP set bonuses and the PvE set bonuses when fighting players.
power_display_names: Fury of the Gladiator: Chance for -Res
